patthana15.37:4.1: Nosaññojanaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana15.37:4.3: noganthaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana15.37:4.5: nooghaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noogho nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana15.37:4.7: noyogaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noyogo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana15.37:4.9: nonīvaraṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana15.37:4.11: noparāmāsaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
